title: Jupyter Notebook MacOS kernel crash
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

Kernel dies when I run 

```
import deeplabcut
```



### Operating System

macOS 11.6

### DeepLabCut version

```
deeplabcut==2.2.0.2
```

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9750H CPU @ 2.60GHz

### Steps To Reproduce

1. Install using the conda YAML file
2. Switch to that environment
3. Start a Jupyter notebook
4. Try `import deeplabcut`

It fails, and the kernel restarts. No error messages are printed to notebook

### Relevant log output

```shell
ERROR:asyncio:Exception in callback <TaskWakeupMethWrapper object at 0x7fbb7847d4f0>(<Future finis...late\r\n\r\n'>)

    self._context.run(self._callback, *self._args)
RuntimeError: Cannot enter into task <Task pending name='Task-4' coro=<HTTP1ServerConnection._server_request_loop() running at /Users/srinivas/opt/anaconda3/envs/DEEPLABCUT/lib/python3.8/site-packages/tornado/http1connection.py:823> wait_for=<Future finished result=b'GET /kernel...flate\r\n\r\n'> cb=[IOLoop.add_future.<locals>.<lambda>() at /Users/srinivas/opt/anaconda3/envs/DEEPLABCUT/lib/python3.8/site-packages/tornado/ioloop.py:688]> while another task <Task pending name='Task-2' coro=<KernelManager._async_start_kernel() running at /Users/srinivas/opt/anaconda3/envs/DEEPLABCUT/lib/python3.8/site-packages/jupyter_client/manager.py:332>> is being executed.
```

### Anything else?

Similar to https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/issues/1102

which has been closed without resolution
